inputFields.name: applyToSeries
inputFields.description: Whether changes should be applied to series of events

inputFields.name: attributes
inputFields.description: Attrbute ids to associate with the event

inputFields.name: covidPrecautions
inputFields.description: List of hosted defined precautions for COVID 19

inputFields.name: deleteZoomMeeting
inputFields.description: If true, any connection to a saved zoom meeting is canceled from the event.

inputFields.name: description
inputFields.description: String setting the description of the event, in simple HTML format. May not be longer than 50000 characters.

inputFields.name: duration
inputFields.description: Representing event duration in milliseconds. This defaults to 10800000 (3 hours).

inputFields.name: eventHosts
inputFields.description: List of up to 5 valid member ids who will be hosts of the event.

inputFields.name: eventId
inputFields.description: Identifier of event which will be edited

inputFields.name: featuredPhotoId
inputFields.description: Positive integer representing a numeric identifier for a photo, which must be one associated with this group. When undefined or 0, no photo is set.

inputFields.name: feeOption
inputFields.description: Representing attributes for paid events

inputFields.name: fundraising
inputFields.description: Settings pretaining to fundraising for this event

inputFields.name: howToFindUs
inputFields.description:
String setting the description for the location of the host(s) at the event venue.
For online events this field is used for the event's url.
  
To unset this field, provide a empty string

inputFields.name: location
inputFields.description: Representing adjusted venue latitude and longitude

inputFields.name: proNetworkEvents
inputFields.description: Pro Network Event settings

inputFields.name: publishStatus
inputFields.description: Indicates whether an event will be published to the group or as a draft visible only to the leadership team.  This defaults to "PUBLISHED".

inputFields.name: question
inputFields.description:
String setting the RSVP survey question for the event. May not be longer than 250 characters.
  
To unset this field, provide an empty string

inputFields.name: recurring
inputFields.description: Representing attributes to schedule recurring event

inputFields.name: rsvpSettings
inputFields.description: Representing rsvp settings (open/close time etc.)

inputFields.name: rsvpSurvey
inputFields.description: Representing attributes survey questions which will be available for Pro admins

inputFields.name: speakerDetails
inputFields.description: Speaker details

inputFields.name: startDateTime
inputFields.description: Field representing event start time

inputFields.name: title
inputFields.description: String setting the name of the event. Must be at least 1 character and may not be longer than 80 characters.

inputFields.name: topics
inputFields.description: Topic ids to associate with the event

inputFields.name: venueId
inputFields.description:
Representing a numeric identifier for a venue. For online events use the string alias 'online'.
  
To unset this field, provide a value of "0"

inputFields.name: venueIds
inputFields.description:
List of venues in which given event will take place at.
Needed only for the events with the type HYBRID at the moment.
Only one ONLINE event type id should be passed here
AND only PHYSICAL event type - for the venueId field.

inputFields.name: venueOptions
inputFields.description:
Separate options for multiple venues, used only for hybrid events.
Provided venue ids have to correspond to venueIds under event type.
Alias 'online' can be used instead of online venue id.
This field will be ignored for non-hybrid events.

inputFields.name: venueVisibility
inputFields.description:
Field indicating whether the event venue and host location description
will be visible to non-members of the hosting group.

inputFields.name: zoomMeetingId
inputFields.description: Zoom meeting id (64-bit integer number).
